name: The Richmond Rut (In Search of Fenton)
name_original: The Richmond Rut (In Search of Fenton)
description:
Fenton is still lost... The time has come!

Retain good faith as you traverse the wild in Richmond Park, in search of your beloved dog who ran after deer, into the wilderness and out of sight.

The disruption has taken it's toll on the local flora and fauna, it's not looking good! Fenton is out there still live and well. It's down to you to bring him home safely.


This is a challenging, short, dark, horror survival themed first person shooter based in the district of Richmond-upon-Thames within Greater London.
The main objective is to search for your lost dog "Fenton", collecting whatever you may find to help you find Fenton on the way and to ultimately bring him back home safe and sound.

Weapons found in the game include Shotgun, M4 assault rifle, Grenade Launcher and Nuke Launcher. Defeat enemies such as Rabid Foxes, Stags, Killer Bees and more.

Respect the deer and remember once you're in the park always check your surroundings.
